nodes.description: 1983年黎巴嫩什叶派武装分子对美国使馆和海军陆战队基地实施爆炸袭击
nodes.support_text: The bombings of the US embassy and US Marine barracks, both in 1983, are believed to have been carried out by Lebanese Shia militias

nodes.description: 上述武装分子两年后（1985年）组建了Hezbollah组织
nodes.support_text: that went on to form Hezbollah two years later

edges.support_text: that went on to form Hezbollah two years later
